message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.IR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CV (Computer Vision) - The paper proposes a novel method for registering football broadcast video frames on a static top view model of the playing surface. This involves using edge information from the line markings on the field and formulating the registration problem as a nearest neighbour search over a synthetically generated dictionary of edge map and homography pairs. 
2. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper deals with registering football broadcast videos, which is a multimedia application. 
3. cs.GR (Graphics) - The paper involves generating a static top view model of the playing surface, which can be considered a graphics problem. 
4. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper also discusses an optimization framework for temporal camera stabilization, which is a multimedia application. 
5. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper involves searching for the nearest neighbour in a synthetically generated dictionary, which can be considered an information retrieval problem.
